1154200,KIMBERLEY A                               ,BC  ,   monthly mean of homogeneous station pressure, (hPa), updated to December 2014
Year,    Jan, ,    Feb, ,    Mar, ,    Apr, ,    May, ,    Jun, ,    Jul, ,    Aug, ,    Sep, ,    Oct, ,    Nov, ,    Dec, , Annual, , Winter, , Spring, , Summer, , Autumn
